channel.title: Coup De Grace jutsu combo?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Coup De Grace jutsu combo?" - Will this work?

item.title: Re: Coup De Grace jutsu combo?
item.content:encoded: so I will still steal their village contributions while writing their name down. Thanks :)

item.title: Re: Coup De Grace jutsu combo?
item.content:encoded: You can use jutsu and notepages at the same time. So, yes, you can use a notepage and coup de grace together.

item.title: Coup De Grace jutsu combo?
item.content:encoded: If I use a notepage in a bingo for a note bingo, and at the same time use the coup de grace jutsu to get my bingo'd enemies village contribution, will I get it as well or is it only one or the other? Cause I'm gonna go on a bingo spree and thought I'd help out my village at the same time.
